comments.text:
Created attachment 8981767
tooltip border missing.png

[Affected versions]:
- Firefox 60.0.1, Firefox 61.0b9, Firefox 62.0a1 (2018-05-29)

[Affected platforms]:
- Windows 7x32, Windows 10x64, Ubuntu 14, MacOS 10.13

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox;
2. Enable the Bookmarks Toolbar;
3. Create a bookmark with a really long name with space in front of the text;
4. Hover over it, after it is saved.

[Expected result]:
- Tooltip should be displayed properly.

[Actual result]:
- The right border for the tooltip is not displayed.

[Regression range]:
- Not a regression, was able to reproduce on versions from 2014.

[Additional notes]:
- on Ubuntu and MacOS, the tooltip spreads to fit the whole available screen;
- issue is 100% reproducible once the white space length > tooltip length;
- tooltip is pushed to the left side;
- example of tooltip name(including space):
"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      yourTextHere"
